forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 17C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. SSW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. SSW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
